      • Methods inherited from interface net.openhft.chronicle.decentred.util.HasSuperInterface

        superInterface

    • Method Detail

      • parseOne

        void parseOne(net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.Bytes bytes,
              T listener)
        Parses one data transfer object (dto) from the provided bytes and subsequently invokes the provided listener using the parsed dto.

        The read position of the provided bytes is not affected.

        If the method is unable to parse a dto, the listener is never invoked

        Parameters:
        bytes - to use for parsing the dto
        listener - to invoke once the dto is parsed
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any of the provided parameters are null

      • onMessage

        void onMessage(T component,
               Object message)
        Invokes a method on the given component with the given message as an argument. The invocation method is determined using the class of the message.

        If the method cannot be found or if the invocation fails, the method is never invoked.

        Parameters:
        component - on which to invoke the method
        message - to use as a parameter to the component method invocation
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any of the provided parameters are null
